Translations.Text: Purʙarakat va ʙuzurgvor ast (ja'ne, xajri Alloh ʙisjor va in'omas ʙuzurg ast,) on ki ʙa dasti Ust mulk va podsohii dunjovu oxirat az oni Ust va amru qazojas dar har du cahon guzarost va U ʙar hama ciz tavonost

On, ki marg va zindagiro ofarid, to sumoro ej mardum, ʙijozmojad, ki kadom jak az sumo nekukirdortar, xolistaru durusttar ast va Ust piruzmandi tavono, ki Uro cize notavon naxohad kard, ʙaxsanda ast ʙaroi kase, ki tavʙa kardaast
On, ki haft osmonro taʙaqa-taʙaqa (ja'ne, ʙoloi ham) ofarid. Dar ofarinisi Allohi mehruʙon hec xalal va kamʙudie nameʙini. Boznigar, ojo hec nuqsone va sikofi dar on meʙini
Sipas ʙori digar casm ʙigardon, casmi tu dar hole, ki xasta va notavon ast ʙa sui tu ʙoz megardad

Va haroina osmoni dunjoro ʙa caroƣhoi azim, duraxsanda zinnat dodem va onhoro ʙaroi rondani sajtonho (suzonanda) qaror dodem, zero sajtonho mexohand, ki az axʙori osmon gus dihand va duzdand va ʙaroi onho dar oxirat azoʙ va otasi suzon omoda soxtem, ki ʙa on casonda mesavand
Va ʙaroi kasone, ki ʙa Parvardigorason kofir sudand, azoʙi cahannam ast va ʙarojason ci ʙad cojgahe ast
Hangome ki dar on duzax andoxta savand, az on ovoze ʙenihojat saxti ʙad, vahsatnok mesunavand, dar hole ki duzax ʙar on mecusad

Az siddati xasm nazdik ast, ki duzax ʙar kofiron pora pora savad, hargoh, ki guruhe az odamon dar on duzax andoxta mesavand, faristagoni nigohʙoni on duzax az onho mepursand: «Ojo ʙimdihandae ʙa suroƣi sumo najomad, ki az in azoʙ sumoro ʙim namojad?!»

Gujand: «Ore, ʙimdihandae az nazdi Alloh ʙa sui mo omad va moro ʙim dod, pas mo uro duruƣ sumoridem va guftem, hargiz Alloh cize ʙar kase az odami nozil nakardaast, sumo ej Rasulon cuz dar gumrohii ʙuzurg nested»
Va kofiron gujand: «Agar mo dar dunjo ʙa sunavoii qaʙul mesunidem jo ta'aqqul (fikr) mekardem, misli haqtalaʙon, imruz dar zumrai duzaxijon naʙudem.»
Pas onho ʙa gunohi xud e'tirof kardand va ʙa saʙaʙi kufrason sazovori azoʙi duzax sudand. Dur ʙod axdi duzax az rahmati Alloh

Begumon kasone ki ƣoiʙona az Parvardigorason metarsand, hatto dar holathoe, ki gajr az Alloh kase digar xaʙar nadorad va Uro iʙodat mekunand va nofarmonʙardori namekunand, ʙaroi onho omurzis az gunohho va podosi ʙuzurge (cannat) ast
Va guftori xudro pinhon dored jo onro oskor sozed, ʙa har hol nazdi Alloh ʙaroʙar ast va cize az guftoru kirdori sumo ʙar Vaj pinhon namemonad, hatto U ʙa on ci dar dilhost, ogoh ast
Ojo kase, ki hamai mavcudotro ofaridaast, xalqijati onro xuʙ va mahkam kardaast, pas ci guna az holi onho namedonad? Dar hole, ki U nozukʙinu ogoh ast ʙa a'moli ʙandagonas

U Zotest, ki zaminro ʙaroi sumo rom hamvor va narm gardonid, to ʙar on qaror gired pas dar gusavu kanori on roh ʙiraved va az rizqu ruzii U ʙixured va zinda sudani duʙora pas az marg ʙaroi hisoʙu cazo ʙa sui Ust
Ojo ej kofironi Makka, xudro az Zote, ki dar osmon Alloh ast dar amon medoned, ki farmon dihad zamin sumoro furu ʙarad, pas on nogahon ʙa larzis darojad, to hama halok saved

Jo xudro az Zote, ki dar osmon ast, dar amon medoned, ki tundʙode hamroh ʙo sangreza ʙar sumo firistad? Pas ej kofiron, ʙa zudi xohed donist, ki husdori man ci guna ast va on zamone, ki ʙo casmi xud azoʙro musohida karded, donistan ʙa sumo foidae nadihad
Va ʙa rosti, kasone ki pes az on kofironi Makka ʙudand, monandi qavmi Nuh, Od va Samud da'vati pajomʙaronro duruƣ sumoridand. Pas azoʙi Man dar ʙaroʙari duruƣ sumoridanason pajomʙaronro ci xuna ʙud

Ojo in kofiron ʙexaʙarand, ʙa parrandagone, ki ʙar ʙoloi sarason ast, ki gohe ʙolhoi xudro mekusojand va gohe furu meʙandand, nigoh nakardand?! Cuz Allohi mehruʙon kase onhoro ʙar farozi osmon nigoh namedorad. Begumon U ʙa har ciz ʙinost
Jo ʙa gumoni sumo on kase ki xud ʙaroi sumo cun sipohe ast, ki sumoro dar ʙaroʙari Allohi mehruʙon jori mekunad, kist? Kofiron cuz dar fireʙ va ƣururason nestand

Jo kist, on Zot, ki ʙa sumo rizqu ruzi dihad, agar U rizqi xudro az sumo ʙozdorad? Balki on kofiron dar sarkasi va ramidagi az haq mahkam pajvastaand. Ja'ne, az haq nafrat va takaʙʙur mevarzand va na pand megirand va na pajravi mekunand
Ojo kase, ki ʙa ru aftoda harakat mekunad va namedonad kuco meravad va ci guna meravad, ʙa hidojat nazdiktarast, jo on kase ki istoda ʙa rohi rost meravad, ki dar on hec kaci nest

Bigu ej Rasul: «U Zotest, ki sumoro naxustin ʙor ofarid, ʙa'd az on ki cize naʙuded va dar adam (nesti) qaror dosted va ʙaroi sumo gus, dod, to ʙa vasilai on ʙisnaved va casmon dod, to ʙa vasilai on ʙuʙined va dilhoro qaror dod, to ʙa vasilai onho dar maxluqoti Alloh ʙiandesed, ammo sumo ej kofiron andake siposguzori mekuned»
Bigu: «U Zotest sumoro ʙijofarid va dar zamin parokanda soxt va ʙa'd az in parokandagi ʙaroi hisoʙu cazo ʙa sui U gird ovarda mesaved»
Va kofiron megujand: Ej Muhammad va ej mu'minon ʙa mo xaʙar dihed va ravsan sozed «Agar rost megued in va'dai qijomat ci zamonest?»

Bigu ej Pajomʙar ʙarojason: «Ilmi qijomat tanho nazdi Alloh ast va man faqat husdordihandai oskor hastam va az oqiʙati kufraton sumoro ʙim mediham va ʙaroi sumo on ciro, ki Alloh ta'olo maro ʙa ʙajoni on amr namudaast, ʙajon mekunam»

Pas cun on kofiron va'dai Allohro az nazdik ʙinand, cehrai kasone, ki kofir sudand sijohu anduhgin megardad va ʙa onho sarzanis karda gufta mesavad: In hamon cizest, ki sumo onro dar dunjo ʙo sitoʙ metalaʙided

Bigu ej Rasul ʙaroi inho kofiron: «Ba man xaʙar dihed, agar Alloh maro va kasone, ki ʙo man hastand, halok kunad, hamcunon ki tamanno mekuned, jo ʙar mo rahmat ovarad va acali moro ʙa ta'xir andozad va az azoʙas nigoh dorad, pas ci kase kofironro az azoʙi dardnok panoh medihad?!»

Bigu: «U Allohi mehruʙon ast ʙa U imon ovardem va ʙa sariati U amal kardem va ʙar U dar hamai umuri zindagiamon tavakkal kardem, pas ej kofiron ʙa zudi xohed donist, ci kase dar gumrohii oskor ast mo jo sumo?!»
Bigu ej Rasul ʙaroi in musrikon: «Ba man xaʙar dihed agar oʙi nusokii sumo dar zamin furu ravad va ʙa hec vasilae dastrase jofta natavoned, pas ci kase metavonad ʙaroi sumo oʙi ravon ʙijovarad?!»
Nun. Alloh savgand jod mekunad: Savgand ʙa qalam va on ci menavisand, faristagon va odamon az xajru naf' va ilmho
ki tu ej Rasul ʙa fazli Parvardigorat, ki pajomʙari va risolatro ʙar tu arzoni namudaast, devona nesti
Begumon ʙaroi tu ej Rasul, on ci az saxtiho kasidai ʙar taʙliƣi risolat, mukofoti pojonnopazir ast
va haroina, tu ej Rasul ʙar xulqi azim hasti
Ba zudi tu ej Rasul meʙini va on kofiron niz meʙinand
ki devonagi dar kadom jake az sumost
Alʙatta, Parvardigori tu ʙehtar medonad ci kase ʙadʙaxt ast va az rohi hidojati U gumroh gastaast va U ʙa parhezgoroni rohjoftagon (ʙa dini haq) donotar ast
Pas, ej Rasul ʙar dini xud ustuvor ʙos va ʙa duruƣsumorandagon ito'at makun
Tamanno va dust dorand, ki ʙo onho narmi kuni, to ʙaroi tu narmi kunand
Va ej Rasul, az har furumojae (paste), ki ʙisjor savgand mexurad, pajravi makun
Ajʙcue, ki ʙaroi suxancini in covu on co meravad va mijoni onho fasod meorad
ʙozdoranda az xajr, ki ʙar xajr kardani mol ʙaxil ast, az had guzaranda, ki ʙa mardum tacovuz mekunad, gunahkor, ki ʙar harom ʙisjor dast zadaast
daƣalmarde, ki ʙadxulq va ʙadraftor ast, zinozoda, (haromzodai ʙepadar)
ʙa xotire, ki sohiʙi molu farzand ast sarkasi kard va az paziruftani haq takaʙʙur kard
cun jake az ojoti Mo ʙar u xonda savad, onro duruƣ sumorad va gujad: «Afsonahoi pesinijon ast»
Ba zudi ʙar ʙinias doƣ guzorem, ki nazdi mardum ʙo on doƣ ʙad savad

Haroina, Mo ahli Makkaro ʙo gurusnagivu qahti ozmudaem, cunon ki sohiʙoni on ʙoƣro ozmudem. On goh, ki mijoni xud qasam xurdand, ki fardo ʙomdod hatman mevahoro xohand cid va azm kardand, ki miskinonro az on mahrum gardonand
Va insoalloh naguftand, (ja'ne, «agar Alloh xohad» naguftand)
GTas, azoʙe (otasi farogir saʙona) az sui Parvardigorat ʙar ʙoƣi onho furu omad, dar hole, ki hama dar xoʙ ʙudand
Pas on ʙoƣi saʙzu xurram hamcun saʙi sijoh sud
Va sahargohon jakdigarro nido dodand
«Agar mexohed meva ʙicined, ʙomdodon ʙa kistzori xud ʙiraved!»
Sipas ʙa roh aftodand va ohista ʙa hamdigar suxan meguftand
ki imruz naʙojad miskine ʙa ʙoƣi sumo darojad
Va suʙhgohon zud tavonmand (ʙa xotiri man'i ʙenavojon) ʙa on ʙoƣ rasidand, ki xudro ʙar cidani meva va man'i ʙenavojon tavono medidand
Cun ʙoƣi xudro didand, guftand: Rohro gum kardem. Pas on hangom, donistand, ki on ʙoƣi onhost, guftand
Balki, mo az hosil mahrumsudaem, ʙa saʙaʙi ʙuxle, ki az mo sar zad
Jake az ʙehtarini onho guft: Ojo ʙa sumo naguftam, caro sukru tasʙehi Allohro namegued va «insoalloh» nagufted
Ba'd az on ki ʙa rohi haq ʙargastand, guftand: Pok ast Parvardigori mo, az zulme, ki ʙa mo rasidaast, ʙalki haroina, mo ʙar nafsi xud va qasdi ʙadamon sitamkor ʙudaem
Pas, ʙa xotiri «insoalloh» naguftanason va qasdi ʙadason on goh malomatkunon ʙa jakdigar ru ovardand
Guftand: Voj ʙar mo, : haroina, mo mardumi sarkase ʙudaem, ki ʙenavojonro man' kardem va muxolifati amri Alloh ʙaromadem
ʙosad, ki ʙa saʙaʙi tavʙa va iqrori gunohoni xud Parvardigori mo dar ivaz, cize ʙehtar az on ʙoƣ moro dihad. Haroina, Mo ʙa Parvardigori xud ruj ovardaem

Incunin ast azoʙ, monandi azoʙe, ki sohiʙoni on ʙoƣro muʙtalo kardem, hamin guna azoʙi mo dar dunjo ʙaroi kasest, ki amri Allohro muxolifat mekunad va az xajr kardani mol ʙaxili menamojad. Va agar ʙidonand, azoʙi oxirat ʙuzurgtar ast, alʙatta az har saʙaʙe, ki muciʙi azoʙ ast, xudro ʙartaraf mesoxtand
Haroina, ʙaroi parhezgoron, onon, ki az azoʙi Alloh tarsidand, ʙo ancom dodani amrhojas va tark namudani man'kardahojas dar nazdi Parvardigorason ʙoƣhoest purne'mat va ʙardavom
Ojo pas mo musalmononro hamcun gunahkoron qaror medihem
Sumoro ci sudaast? ci guna dovari mekuned, pas har du guruhro dar cazo ʙaroʙar xohem kard? Hec goh
Ojo sumoro kitoʙest, az osmon nozil suda, ki az on mexoned va dars megired, ki farmonʙardor monandi gunahkor ast
Va ʙa tahqiq, dar on kitoʙ on ciro intixoʙ kuned, ʙaroi sumo navistasuda ast?! (Hargiz cunin nest)
Jo in ki sumo ʙar uhdai Mo ahdu pajmoni ustuvore dored, ki to ruzi qijomat har ciro hukm kuned, haq ʙaroi sumo ʙosad
Ej Rasul, az musrikon ʙipurs, kadom jakeason zomini cunin pajmonest, ki kofiron dar oxirat monandi mu'minonand
Jo onhoro sarikonest, ki onhoro dar oxirat hamonandi musalmonon gardonand? Agar rost megujand, dar da'voi xud, pas sarikoni xudro ʙijovarand

Ruze, ki soq ʙarahna va maksuf gardad, (ja'ne, ruzi qijomat vaz'ijat ʙenihojat Dusvor gardad, dar on ruz Alloh ta'olo soqi xudro, ki ʙe ci gunagi va ʙa cize monandi nadorad, oskor kunad, Alloh ta'olo ʙaroi dovari mijoni mardum ʙijojad) va hama xaloiq ʙa sacda faro xonda savand, pas munofiqon va musrikon sacda kardan nametavonand

Dar hole, ki casmonason az nadomat va xicolat furu aftoda va az azoʙi Alloh zillat va xori onhoro furu girad va haqiqatan, ki pes az on dar dunjo dar hole, ki solim ʙudand, ʙa sacda faro xonda mesudand, ammo onho az rui takaʙʙur sacda namekardand

Pas, ej Rasul, Maro ʙo kase, ki in suxan (Qur'on)-ro duruƣ meʙarorad, voguzor, zero intiqom az onho va cazo dodanason ʙar Man ast. Mo onhoro ʙa zudi az on coe, ki namedonand, andak-andak ʙa azoʙ xohem girift
Va ʙa onho muhlat diham va umrasonro daroz kunam, to gunohro zijod kunand. Alʙatta, tadʙiri Man tadʙiri ustuvor ast va kase az on rahoi nadorad
Ej Rasul jo az musrikon, dar ivazi taʙliƣi risolat muzde metalaʙi, pas tovoni on ʙarojason garonʙor ast va onho az adoi on dar rancand
Jo ilmi ƣajʙ nazdi onhost, pas onho az rui on menavisand on ciro, ki megujand

Pas ej Rasul ʙaroi farmon va hukmi Parvardigorat saʙr kun, va monandi sohiʙi mohi (Junus iʙni Mato alajhissalom,) maʙos, ki dar da'vati qavmas saʙr nakard va cun sarsor az ƣamu anduh ʙud, Allohro nido kard
Agar ne'mat va rahmate az sui Parvardigoras uro darnamejoft, jaqinan az sikami mohi ʙa sahroi ʙeoʙu alaf partofta mesud, dar hole, ki u ʙadhol ʙud
Pas, Parvardigoras uro ʙaroi risolatas ixtijor kard va uro az zumrai solehon qaror dod, ki nijat, a'mol va aqvolason soista va durust ast
Va kofiron cun Qur'onro sunidand, nazdik ʙud, ki az saʙaʙi ʙad didanason turo ʙo casmoni xud ʙilaƣƶonand va az rui hasad megujand, ki qat'an u devona ast
Va hol on ki Qur'on ʙaroi cahonijon (az insu cin) faqat pande ast
On ruzi ʙarhaq, (ja'ne qijomate, ki omadani on haq ast va savoʙu azoʙ va haqiqat dar on ruz oskor mesavad)
Cist ahvol va sifathoi on ruzi ʙarhaq
Va ci ciz turo ej Rasul ogoh kard, az haqiqat va saxtii on ruzi ʙarhaq
Qavmi Samudu Od saxtii ruzi qijomatro duruƣ sumoridand
Pas, ammo qavmi Samud ʙa on ʙongi saxt qavi va halokkunanda halok sudand
Va ammo qavmi Od ʙo vazisi ʙodi Sarsar (saxt sard) ʙa halokat rasidand

On azoʙro haft saʙu hast ruz paj dar paj ʙar onon firistod, na qat' mesud va na orom megirift. On qavmro dar on saʙhovu ruzho az po dar aftoda cun tanahoi pusidai daraxti xurmo resakansuda medidi, ki aftodaandu murdaand
Ojo kasero meʙini, ki az onho ʙar coj monda ʙosad? (Hargiz)
Va Fir'avnu mardume, ki pes az u ʙudand, az ahli kuffor va niz mardumi Mu'tafika gunahkor omadand
Har ummate az onho firistodai Parvardigorasonro nofarmoni kardand, pas, Alloh niz onhoro ʙa nihojat saxti furu girift
Mo on goh, ki oʙ az had guzast va ʙar hama ciz ʙaland sud, sumoro ʙar sulʙi padaraton ʙa kisti savor kardem
to nacot dodani mu'minon va ƣarq kardani kofironro ʙaroi sumo pande qaror dihem va gushoi sunavo onro ʙisunavand va ʙa jod suporand
Pas cun jak ʙor dar sur damida savad, hama mardum memirand va olam vajron mesavad
va zaminu kuhho ʙardosta savad va jakʙora darham kuʙida savand, pas sikasta savand
pas on ruz on voqe'a (qijomat) ruj dihad
Va osmon sikofta mesavad, pas dar on ruz sust megardad va furu merezad
Va faristagon dar atrofi osmon ʙosand, Va dar on ruz hast tan az onho Arsi Parvardigoratro ʙar ʙoloi sarason meʙardorand
On ruz sumoro, ej odamon ʙaroi hisoʙu cazo nazdi Parvardigoraton pes ovarand va hec ciz az asrori sumo nihon namonad
Pas cun har kasro, ki nomai a'molasro ʙa dasti rostas dihand, pas az xursandi megujad: Nomai maro ʙigiredu ʙixoned
Man dar dunjo jaqin dostam, ki hisoʙi xudro ruzi qijomat xoham did va az ʙaroi imruz ʙo imonu amali soleh xudro omoda kardaam
Pas, u dar jak zindagii pisandidavu xus xohad ʙud
dar ʙihiste oli
ki mevahojas dastras ʙosad
Barojason gufta mesavad: Bixuredu ʙijosomed, guvoro ʙod sumoro. Inho mukofoti a'molest, ki dar ajjomi guzasta dar dunjo pes firistoda ʙuded
Va ammo on kas, ki nomai a'molasro ʙa dasti capas dihand, (az rui hasrat) megujad: «Ej kos, nomai maro ʙa dasti man nadoda ʙudand
va nadonista ʙudam, ki thisoʙi man cist
Ej kos, hamon marg dar dunjo meʙudu ʙas! Va dar oxirat zinda namesudam
Doroii man, ki dar dunjo cam' namuda ʙudam, maro sud naʙaxsid
qudrat va huccati man az dasti man raft va ʙa kulli noʙud sud va maro huccate nest, ki ʙa on huccatovari namojam
Ba nigahʙononi duzax gufta mesavad: «Bigired va dastoni uro ʙar gardanas ʙo zancirho ʙuʙanded
Ba ʙa'd az on ʙa cahannamas darored, to garmii onro ʙicasad
Va uro ʙo zancire, ki darozii on haftod ziro' ast, ʙikased
Zero ʙa Allohi ʙuzurg imon nadost va ʙa guftahoi U amal namekard
va dar dunjo ʙa ta'om dodan ʙa miskinon kasero tarƣiʙ namekard
Pas ʙaroi kofir imruz dar in co dar ruzi qijomat dusti samime va mehruʙone nadorad, ki az azoʙi Alloh uro nacot dihad
Ta'omas cize cuz cirku xuni axdi duzax nest
Tanho xatokoron, ki ʙar kufri xud pojdorand az on ta'om mexurand
Pas, Alloh savgand jod mekunad: Savgand ʙa on ci meʙined az didaniho
va on ci nameʙined, az nodidaniho
ki alʙatta, in haroina, Qur'on suxani firistodae ʙuzurgvor ast, ki onro pajomʙari azimussa'n tilovat mekunad
na suxani so'ire. Ci andak imon meovared
Va niz suxani kohine (folʙin, codugar) nest. Ci andak pand megired
Valekin az coniʙi Parvardigori cahonijon ʙar firistodai xud, Muhammad (sallallohu alajhi va sallam) nozil sudaast
Agar (Muhammad) ʙa'ze suxanonro az xud ʙofta ʙar mo meʙast
haroina, ʙo qudrat uro furu megiriftem
sipas, haroina, ragi dilasro pora mekardem
va hec jak az sumoro tavoni on naʙuvad, ki az azoʙi u mone' savad
Va alʙatta, Qur'on ʙaroi parhezgoron pandest, ki onho farmudahoi Allohro ʙa co meorand va az man'kardahojas dur meistand
Mo, haroina, medonem, ki az mijoni sumo kasone hastand, ki ʙa in Qur'on ʙo vucudi ravsan ʙudani ojotas takziʙ mekunand, duruƣ mesumorand
Va alʙatta, Qur'on kofironro mojai hasrat va pusajmoni ast dar ruzi qijomat, ongoh, ki podosi mu'minon va azoʙasonro meʙinand
Va on, haroina, suxani haq va jaqin ast, ki dar on sakke nest
Pas, ʙa nomi Parvardigori ʙuzurgat tasʙeh ʙiguj va az on ci ki ʙa Zoti poki U loiq nest, ʙa poki jod kun
Pursandae az musrikon ʙaroi xud va qavmas azoʙe pursid, ki
ʙar kofiron ruzi qijomat furud xohad omad, ki kase onro daf' natavonad kard
Az coniʙi Allohe, ki sohiʙi martaʙahoi ʙuzurgu olist
Dar ruze, ki miqdoras ʙo ruzhoi dunjo pancoh hazor sol ast, faristagon va ruh (Caʙrail alajhissalom) ʙa sui U ʙolo ravand
Pas, saʙr kun ej Pajomʙar dar ʙaroʙari ozoru azijati onho, saʙre, ki dar on nolis va sikojat nest, ʙa ƣajri Alloh
Alʙatta kofiron on ruzi azoʙro dur va voqe'nopazir meʙinand
Ba Mo onro voqe'savanda va nazdikas meʙinem
Ruze, ki osmon cun misi gudoxta gardad
Va kuhho cun pasmi rangine gardand, ki ʙod onhoro pareson kardaast
Va hec xesovande az holi xesovandi xud napursad
Jakdigarro meʙinand va mesinosand, nametavonad kase ʙa digare foidae rasonad. Az azoʙi on ruz kofir orzu mekunad, ki ʙaroi nacoti xud farzandoni xudro ʙa ivaz dihad
va niz zanu ʙarodarasro
va niz xesonasro, ki uro coj dodaand
va niz hamai onhoero, ki dar rui zaminand az odamon va ƣajrason, sipas xudro az azoʙi Alloh nacot dihad
Hargiz na, ej kofir! Hec guna ivaz turo az azoʙ nacot namedihad. Hamono duzax otasest su'lazananda
Az saxtii garmias pusti sar va soiri atrofi ʙadanro mekanad
Mexonad ʙa xud in otasi suzon har kiro, ki dar dunjo az haq ruj gardonida, tarki ito'ati Alloh va rasulas karda ʙud
Va cam' kard pulu molro, pas zaxira kard va ado nakard haqqi Allohro dar molas
Alʙatta, odami harisu ʙesaʙr ofarida sudaast
Cun ʙadi va vazninie ʙa u rasad, ʙeqarori kunad
Va cun xuʙi va osoni ʙa dastas aftad, ʙaxili mekunad
magar namozguzorone
ki namozasonro dar hama holat mexonand va jagon cize onhoro az namoz masƣul namesozad
Va onon, ki dar amvolason haqqest mu'ajjan (ja'ne, zakot)
ʙaroi pursandavu (gadojon) va on, ki az qano'atmandi namepursad
Va kasone, ki ruzi qijomatro tasdiq mekunand, pas ʙa amalhoi soleh ʙaroi on ruz tajjori meʙinand
Va kasone, ki az azoʙi Parvardigorason tarsonand
ki haroina az azoʙi Parvardigorason dar amon natavonand ʙud
Va kasone, ki sarmgohi xudro az tamomi on cizhoe, ki harom ast, nigah medorand
magar ʙaroi hamsaronason jo kanizonason, ki dar in hol, alʙatta, malomate ʙar onho nest
Pas kase, ki ʙaroi qazoi sahvati xud az ƣajri hamsaronu kanizoni xud talaʙ kunad, pas onho, az had xuzastagonand
Va kasone, ki amonathoi Alloh va ʙandagon va ahdhoi ʙa Alloh va ʙandagonro ri'oja mekunand
Va kasone, ki sahodati xudro ʙa haq ʙetaƣjir va pusis ado mekunand
Va kasone, ki namozhojasonro dar vaqtas mexonand va jagon vociʙero az on tark namekunand
Inhoe, ki cunin sifathoi ʙuzurtero dorand, coj doda sudaand dar ʙihisthoi giromi mukarramu mu'azzaz
Pas, cist, ki kofiron ʙa sui tu ej Pajomʙar mesitoʙand
Dasta - dasta az coniʙi capu rosti tu cam' sudaand, suxan megujandu taaccuʙ mekunand
Ojo har jake az on kofiron tama' mekunad, ki Alloh ta'olo ʙa ʙihisti purne'mat doxilas mekunad
Hargiz na, hec jake az onho ʙa cannat doxil namesavad. Alʙatta Mo ofaridem onhoro az oʙi mani, ki xud medonand, pas imon naovardand. Pas ci guna musarraf mesavand ʙa daromadani cannat
Pas, savgand ʙa Parvardigori masriqi oftoʙu sitoragon va maƣriʙhojason, ki Mo, haroina tavonoem
ki ʙa coi onho mardumi ʙehtar va mute'tar ʙa Allohro ʙijovarem va dar in kor notavon nestem va hec kas az Mo pesdasti nakunad va Moro ʙoznadorad, har vaqte ki xohem i'oda kardani onhoro
Pas, ʙiguzorason (musrikonro), to ʙa ʙehudagi masƣul savandu va dar dunjojason ʙozi kunand, to ʙa ruzi qijomat ʙirasand, ki va'daason dodaem ʙa azoʙ
Ruze, ki sitoʙon az qaʙrho ʙarojand, cunonki dar dunjo nazdi ʙutonason, ki ʙa ƣajri Aldoh onhoro iʙodat mekardand, mesitoʙand

Vahsat ʙar casmonason ƣoliʙ suda az havlu haros va ʙa xori aftodaand. In ast hamon ruze, ki onhoro va'da doda mesud dar hajoti dunjo, ki omadani qijomat haq va rost ast va onho istehzo mekardandu duruƣ meʙarovardand
Mo, haroina, Nuhro ʙa sui qavmas firistodem va ʙa u guftem, ki qavmi xudro pes az on ki azoʙi dardovar ʙar sarason furud ojad, ʙim deh
Nuh guft: «Ej qavmi man, man haroina, ʙimdihandai oskoro hastam sumoro az azoʙi Alloh, agar Uro nofarmoni kuned
Va hamono man firistodai Alloh hastam ʙa sui sumo, pas Uro jagona ʙiparasted va az azoʙi U ʙitarsed va az man ito'at kuned, dar on cize, ki sumoro amr jo man' mekunam

Alloh gunohonatonro ʙijomurzad va sumoro dar umraton, to muddati mu'ajjane, ki dar ilmi Alloh ast muhlat dihad, haroina, on acali Ilohi cun ʙa sar ojad, digar ta'xir nasavad, agar sumo inro medonisted, hamono ʙa sui imon va to'at harakat mekarded»
Guft Nuh: «Ej Parvardigori man, man haroina, qavmi xudro saʙu ruz ʙa sui Tu da'vat kardam
Pas da'vati man onhoro ʙa sui imon zijoda nakard dar onho, cuz gurextanu nafrat az imonro

Va alʙatta, man, har ʙor, ki onhoro ʙa sui Tu da'vat kardam, to Tu onhoro ʙijomurzi, angustho dar gushoi xud kardand, to da'vati haqro nasunavand va coma dar sar kasidand, to, ki maro naʙinand va davomat kardand ʙar kufri xud va takaʙʙur kardand az qaʙuli imon, takaʙʙur kardani saxt
Pas, ʙarojason oskoro da'vat kardam
Boz, haroina, dar hama hol ham ʙa ovozi ʙaland va ham ʙo ovozi past ʙarojason da'vat kardam
Sipas guftam ʙa qavmam: «Az Parvardigoraton omurzisi gunohojatonro kuned va ʙa sui U az kufri xud tavʙa kuned. Alʙatta, U ta'olo omurzandai tavʙai ʙandagonas ast
Agar tavʙa karda az U omurzis talaʙ kuned, mefiristad Alloh ta'olo ʙarojaton ʙoronhoi rezandaro paj dar paj
Va molu farzandonatonro zijod mekunad va ʙarojaton ʙustonho ʙijofarinad, to, ki az mevahojas foida ʙared va darjoho to, ki az oʙas ziro'at va molhojatonro oʙ ʙidihed
Sumoro ej qavm ci sudaast, ki az ʙuzurgi va azamati Alloh nametarsed
Va hamono sumoro ʙa gunahoi muxtalif ʙijofarid
Ojo nameʙined, ki ci guna Alloh haft osmonro taʙaqa - taʙaqa ʙoloi ham ʙijofarid
Va mohro dar in osmonho ravsani va xursedro ʙaroi ahli zamin caroƣason gardonid
Va Alloh asli sumoro az zamin ʙirujonid
Boz sumoro ʙa'd az margaton ʙa on ʙozmegardonad va ʙoz ruzi ʙa's az on ʙerun meovarad
Va Alloh zaminro cun farse ʙarojaton soxt
to ʙar rohhoi pahnovari on ʙiraved»
Nuh guft: «Ej Parvardigori man, hamono qavmi man nofarmonii man kardand va ʙecoragoni onho pajravi kardand pesvojoni gumrohasonro, ki molu farzandas cuz ʙa zijonason najafzud
Va makru hila kardand sardoroni kuffor pajravoni xudro - makri ʙuzurge
Va guftand: «Parastisi ma'ʙudoni xudro, ʙa coi Allohi jagonae, ki Nuh ʙa sui on da'vat mekunad, tark nakuned. Va parastisi Vadd va Suvo' va Jaƣus va Ja'uq va Nasrro tark makuned!»
Va hamono on pajravon ʙisjore az mardumro ʙo zinnat dodani rohhoi gunoh gumroh kardand. Ba'd az on Nuh alajhissalom guft: Ej Parvardigori mo majafzoj ʙa on sitamkoroni sarkas magar duriro az haq!»
Ba cazoi gunohonason ʙa tufon ƣarqa karda sudand, pas ʙa otasi dargirandavu suzonanda doxil karda sudand, pas ʙa cuz Alloh ʙaroi xud jovare najoftand, ki az onho azoʙro dur kunad
Va Nuh alajhissalom ʙa'di noumed sudanas az qavmas guft: «Ej Parvardigori man, ʙar rui zamin hec jak az kofironro maguzor, ki harakat kunad
Hamono, agar tu onhoro ʙiguzoriju va halokason nakuni, ʙandagonero, ki ʙa Tu az rohi haq imon ovardaand, gumroh mekunand va farzandone tavallud namekunand, magar fociru kofir

Ej Parvardigori man, marovu padaru modaramro va har kiro ʙo imon ʙa xonai man vorid savad va niz mardoni mu'minu zanoni mu'minro ʙijomurz va sitamkoronro dar dunjovu oxirat cuz ʙa halokatason majafzoj!»

Bigu ej Pajomʙar: Alloh ta'olo ʙa man vahj kardaast, ki guruhe az cin hamono gus faro dodand, hangome ki man tilovati Qur'on mekardam. Pas cun sunidand, ʙa qavmason guftand: Hamono sunidem Qur'onro, xele xus ast dar ʙaloƣatas, fasohatas va dar axkomu axʙoras
da'vat mekunad ʙa sui haq va hidojat. Pas, mo ʙa in Qur'on imon ovardem va hargiz kasero dar iʙodat sariki Parvardigoramon namesozem
Va alʙatta, azamati Parvardigori mo olist. Na hamsare girad va na farzande dorad
Va ʙexiradi mo Iʙlis dar ʙorai Alloh ta'olo suxanoni dur az haq meguft
Va mo, haroina, mepindostem, odamu cin dar ʙorai Alloh ta'olo, hargiz duruƣ namegujand
Va niz mardone ʙudand az odamijon, ki ʙa mardone az cin panoh meʙurdand, pas zijoda kardand mardoni cin ʙar inshoi panohcuj tarsu harosi ʙestarro
Va hamcunon, ki sumo ej guruhi cinho mepindosted, insonhoi kofir ham mepindostand, ki Alloh ta'olo, hargiz, hec kasro duʙora ʙa'd az marg zinda namegardonad

Va mo guruhi cinho talaʙ kardem ʙa osmon rasidanro to ʙisnavem suxanhoi ahli osmonro, pas onro joftem pur az faristagoni nigahʙonu qudratmand ʙo sitoragon, ki andoxta mesavad ʙa on kasero, ki ʙa osmon nazdik mesavad
Va mo, haroina menisastem pes az in ʙa cojhoe az osmon; to ʙisnavem axʙorasro. Pas, har ki aknun ʙaroi gus kardan nisinad, sihoʙero (otasporaero) dar kamini xud joʙad, ki uro suzonda halok mekunad
Va mo guruhi cinho namedonem, ki ojo ʙaroi kasone, ki ʙa ruji zamin hastand, ʙadi muqaddar mesavad jo Parvardigorason mexohad ʙa rohi rostason ʙiʙarad
Va ʙa'ze az mo nekukoru solehand va ʙa'ze az mo ƣajri in kofiru fosiqand va guruhhoi gunogunem

Va mo jaqin donistem, ki Alloh ʙar mo qodir ast va mo dar zeri qaʙza va farmonravoii U meʙosem, pas agar korero ʙa mo xohad, az U gurextan natavonem. Va hargiz natavonem sui osmon gurextan az azoʙas, agar ʙadiero ʙa mo xohad

Va cun Qur'onro sunidem, ʙa on imon ovardem va iqror kardem, ki Qur'on az nazdi Alloh ast. Pas har ki ʙa Parvardigoras imon ovarad, pas na az nuqsoni hasanotas metarsad va na az sitam (ja'ne, maʙodo, ki dar ʙadihojas izofae nasavad)
Va haroina, ʙa'ze az mo cinho musalmononand va ʙa'ze az haq dur. Pas onhoe, ki islom ovardaand, pas onho qasd kardaand rohi rostro
Va ammo onhoe, ki az rohi Islom durand, pas onho hezumi cahannamand
Va agar odamoni kofir va cinhoi kofir ʙa rohi Islom meraftand, haroina, ʙaroi onho oʙi ʙisjorero furud meovardem va rizqasonro dar dunjo farox mekardem
to onhoro ʙijozmoem ci guna ne'mathoi Allohro sukr mekunand? Va har ki az to'ati Parvardigoras va gus kardani Qur'on va amal kardan ʙa on ruj gardonad, uro ʙa azoʙe saxt darandozand
Va haroina, mascidho ʙaroi iʙodati Allohi jagona hastand. Pas iʙodat nakuned dar on co ƣajrasro. Hamono mascidho faqat ʙaroi iʙodati Allohi jagona soxta sudaand
Va cun ʙandai Alloh Muhammad (sallallohu alajhi va sallam) ʙaroi parastisi Parvardigoras ʙarxost, nazdik ʙud, ki cinho uro ʙolo-ʙoloi ham gird kunand, to ʙisnavand az u Qur'onro
Bigu ej Pajomʙar ʙa on kofiron: Tanho Parvardigoramro jagona parastis mekunam va hec kasro dar iʙodat sariki U namesozam
Bigu ej Pajomʙar ʙa onho: Alʙatta, man nametavonam ʙar sumo zijone ʙirasonam jo ʙaroi sumo foidae ʙijovaram
Bigu: Hec kas maro, az azoʙi Alloh nacot nadihad agar nofarmonii U kunam va man cuz U, hargiz, panohgohe namejoʙam

Vale on ci metavonam rasondani pajjomi U ta'olo va ancom dodani risolathoi U meʙosad. Va har ki Allohu pajomʙarasro nofarmoni kunad, pas, nasiʙi u, haroina, otasi cahannam ast, ki hamesa dar on xohad ʙud
To on goh, ki on ciro ʙa musrikon va'da doda ʙudand, (ja'ne azoʙro) ʙingarand. Pas, xohand donist, ci kasonero joroni notavontar va sumori kamtar ʙudaast
Ej Pajomʙar, ʙa musrikon ʙigu: Man namedonam, ki ojo on va'dai azoʙe, ki ʙa sumo dodaand, nazdik ast jo Parvardigori man ʙaroi on zamone nihodaast
U ta'olo donoi ƣajʙ ast va ƣajʙi Xudro ʙar hec kas az xalkas oskor namesozad

magar ʙar on pajomʙare, ki uro ʙaroi risolatas ixtijor kardaast va az u xusnud ʙosad, pas uro ʙa ʙa'ze az ilmi ƣajʙas xaʙardor mekunad va ʙaroi nigahʙonii u (az cin), az pesi ruj va pusti saras nigahʙone (faristae) qaror medihad, maʙodo xaʙari ƣajʙro naduzdand va ʙa gusi kohinon narasonand

To ʙidonad, Pajomʙar (sallallohu alajhi va salllam), pajomʙaroni pes az u niz ham pajomhoi Parvardigorasonro haq va rost rasonidaand va u ham hifz karda sudaast az cin, hamcunon ki pajomʙaroni pesina hifz karda suda ʙudand. Va Alloh ta'olo ʙa on ci dar nazdi onhost, az ilmhoi oskoro va pinhoni amrho va hukmho ihota dorad, cize az U favt nasavad va U ta'olo hama cizro ʙa adad sumor kardaast
Ej coma ʙar xud pecida
saʙro ʙo namoz zinda ʙidor, magar andakero
qijomi nimi saʙ kun jo andake az nima kam kun
Jo andake ʙar soati nimi saʙ ʙijafzoj va Qur'onro ohista ʙo tadaʙʙur sumurdavu (ʙodiqqatu) ravsan ʙixon
Hamono Mo ʙa tu ej Pajomʙar Qur'oni ʙuzurgero, ki dar ʙar megirad amru nahjho va ahkomi sari'atro nozil xohem kard
Alʙatta, iʙodate, ki dar dili saʙ surat megirad, ta'siri saxte dorad dar dil va lafzhojas durusttar ast ʙa saʙaʙi foriƣ ʙudani dil az korhoi dunjavi
Alʙatta, korhoi tu dar ruz ʙisjor ast. Pas, saʙho Parvardigoratro iʙodat kun
Va jod kun ej Pajomʙar, nomi Parvardigoratro va az hama taraf gusasta kanda suda ʙa iʙodatas ʙipajvand
(ja'ne, ʙo sidqu ixlos ʙandagi kun). Ust podsohi masriqu maƣriʙ. Nest hec ma'ʙudi ʙarhaqqe cuz U. Pas Uro korsozi xes intixoʙ kun
Va saʙr kun ʙar on ci musrikon dar sa'ni tu va dinat megujand va ʙa vachi pisandida az onho duri cuj
Duruƣsumorandagoni sohiʙne'matro ʙa Man voguzor. Va andake muhlatason deh, to furud omadani azoʙ ʙar onho
Alʙatta, hast nazdi Mo dar oxirat kisanghoi garon va ʙaroi suxtanu azoʙ dodani onho otasi duzax ast
Va nazdi Mo ta'omi gulugir ast, ki na furu meravad va na ʙerun meojad va niz azoʙi dardovar ast
Ruze, ki zaminu kuhho ʙa larza ojand va kuhho teppae az regi ravon gardand! (Ba'd az on, ki saxtu ustuvor ʙudand)
haroina, Mo ʙar sumo (ej ahli Makka) Muhammadro firistodem, ki guvohidihanda ast ʙar kufru isjoni sumo, hamcunon ki ʙa sui Fir'avn Musoro firistodem
Pas ito'at nakard Fir'avn Musoro. Va ʙa risolatas imon naovard. Pas halok kardem uro halok kardani saxt
Pas ci guna nafshojatonro dar amon memoned, agar kofir ʙosed ʙa azoʙi ruzi qijomat, ki az saxtii vazninias kudakonro pir megardonad
Dar on ruz osmon ʙisikofad va va'dai Alloh xohu noxoh ʙa vuqu' pajvandad
harojina, in nisonahoi tarsonanda pandest ʙaroi mardum. Pas, har ki ʙixohad pand va manfia'te ʙigirad, rohe ʙa sui rozigii Parvardigoras ʙigirad, ki uro xalq kard

haroina, Parvardigori tu (ej Pajomʙar) medonad, ki tu va guruhe az onon, ki ʙo tu hastand, nazdik ʙa du savvumi saʙ jo nisfi on va jo sejaki saʙro ʙa namoz meisted. Va Alloh jagona xudas andozai saʙu ruzro mu'ajjan mekunad. Va medonad, ki sumo tamomi saʙro ʙo namoz guzaronida nametavoned. Pas, tavʙai sumoro ʙipaziruft. Va har ci mujassar savad dar namozi saʙ, az Qur'on ʙixoned. Alloh medonad ci kasone az sumo ʙa saʙaʙi ʙemori az namozi saʙ memonad va guruhe digar ʙa talaʙi rizqi halol az Alloh dar rui zamin ʙaroi ticorat va kor ʙa safar meravand va guruhi digar dar rohi Alloh ʙa cang meravand. Pas har ci mujassar savad, dar namozhojaton az qur'on ʙixoned. Namoz ʙiguzoredu zakot ʙidihed va dar rohhoi xajr va nekuj az molhojaton ehson kuned. Va har xajru ehsone, ki ʙaroi xud dar in dunjo pesopes ʙifiristed, acru savoʙasro ruzi qijomat ʙarzijod xohed joft. Va az Alloh dar tamomi holathojaton omurzis ʙixohed. Haroina, Alloh ʙisjor omurzgor ast ʙaroi kase, ki az vaj omurzis ʙixohad va ʙisjor mehruʙon ast ʙaroi kase, ki az vaj talaʙi rahm kunad
Ej coma dar sar kasida
ʙarxez az coi xoʙat, pas ʙim deh odamonro az azoʙi Alloh
Va takʙiru ta'zimu iʙodatro maxsusi Parvardigorat gardon
Va comaatro az nacosatho pokiza dor
Va davomat kun duri custanro az ʙutho va az korhoi sirk, pas ʙa onho nazdiki makun
Va cize madeh, ki ʙes az on casm dosta ʙosi
Va ʙaroi rozigii Parvardigorat ʙar amru nahjhojas soʙir ʙos
Pas on goh ki dar sur (karnaj) ʙaroi az nav zinda sudan, damida savad
pas on ruz ruzi saxte xohad ʙud
Baroi kofiron oson nest, ki xalos savand az munoqisai hisoʙu kitoʙ
Maro ej Pajomʙar, ʙo on ki dar sikami modaras tanhojas ʙe molu farzand, ofaridaam, voguzor
Va uro moli ʙisjore dodam
Va pisarone hama dar Makka nazdi u hozir
Va vasoili zindagiro az har cihat ʙaroi u faroham soxtaam
On goh tama' meʙandad, ki ʙar ne'matas ʙiafzojam
Hargiz, ki hamono, u dar ʙaroʙari Qur'on va ojoti Mo sarkasi kardu siteza cust
Zud ast, ki ʙa saras masaqqathoero az nav'hoi azoʙe, ki dar on rohat nest meorem
Haroina, u andesid va naqsae kasid
Pas marg ʙar uʙod, ci guna naqsae kasid
Boz ham marg ʙaru ʙod, ci naqsae kasid
Sipas on goh, ki nigarist, (ja'ne, fikr kardu naqsa kasid va tajjori did dar ta'na zadani Qur'on)
Sipas ruj turs kard va pesoni darham kasid. Ba'd az on, ki cize najoft, ki ʙa on Qur'onro ta'na zanad
Sipas ruj gardonid az haq va gardankasi kard az e'tirof sudan ʙa maƣluʙijatas
Pas guft dar ʙorai Qur'on: «In cize, ki Muhammad megujad, cuz codue, manqul az pesinijon rivojat suda, hec nest
In suxani maxluqon ast, ki Muhammad onro ta'lim giriftaastu, ʙa'd az on da'vo mekunad, ki on az nazdi Alloh ast
Ba zudi uro ʙa saqar (duzax) ʙijafkanam. To ʙisuzad dar otasas
Tu ci medoni, ki saqar ci guna ast
Na, gustero ʙoqi meguzorad va na ustuxonero raho mesozad
Taƣjirdihanda va sijohkunandai pust ast
Nuzdah farista ʙaroi azoʙi onho muvakkaland

Muvakkaloni duzaxro cuz az faristagoni saxtgir qaror nadodem. Va sumori onho cuz ʙaroi imtihoni kofiron nest. To ahli kitoʙ (Jahud va Nasoro) ʙovar kunand va ʙar imoni mu'minon ʙijafzojad va axdi kitoʙu mu'minon sak nakunand. Va to on munofiqon va kofiron, ki dar dilhojason marazest, ʙigujand: «Alloh az in sumorai acoiʙ ci mexostaast?» Alloh incunin har kasro, ki ʙixohad, gumroh mekunad va har kasro, ki ʙixohad roh menamojad. Va sumori laskari Parvardigoratro cuz U kasse nadonad. Va in cahannam cuz husdor va pande az ʙaroi mardum nest
Incunin nest, ki onho mepindorand, savgand ʙa moh
Va savgand ʙa saʙ, cun pust kunad ruj ʙa raftan orad
Va savgand ʙa suʙh, cun parda ʙarafkanad
ki haroina, in duzax jake az hodisahoi ʙuzurg ast
Tarsonandai odamijon ast
Baroi har kase az sumo, ki ʙixohad, nazdik sudan ʙa Parvardigorasro ʙo amali nek jo ʙozpas monad ʙo kufru nofarmoni
Har kas garavgoni korest, ki kardaast, xoh nek ast, xoh ʙad az on raho namejoʙad, to on vaqte ki haqqasro ʙidihad
Ƣajri musalmononi xolis onhoe, ki xudasonro ʙo amalhoi soista nacot dodand
Onho dar ʙihistho nisastaand va az jakdigarason mepursand
az kofirone, ki dar haqqi xudason gunoh kardaand
Ci cizhoe sumoro ʙa cahannam darovard
Gujand gunahkoron: "Mo dar dunjo az namozguzoron naʙudem
va ʙa darvesonu kamʙaƣalon ta'om namedodem
va ʙo onon, ki suxani ʙotil meguftand, hamovoz mesudem
va ruzi qijomatro duruƣ mesumoridem
to margi mo faro rasid va mo dar hamon gumrohi ʙudem
Pas, safo'ati safoatkunandagon foidaason naʙaxsad. Zero safo'at ʙaroi onhoest, ki Alloh ta'olo az onho rozist va ʙaroi safoatkunanda icozat dodaast
Pas on musrikonro ci sudaast, ki az Qur'on va pandhoi on ruj gardonand
Monandi xaroni vahsie, ki ramida
az ser megurezand
Balki har jak az on musrikho mexohand, ki az suji Alloh kitoʙi kusodae ʙa u doda savad
Na cunin ast, ki onho mepindorand, ʙalki onho az oxirat nametarsand. Va ʙa ʙa'su cazo ʙovari nadorand
Na cunin ast, ki onho dar ʙorai Qur'on meandesand alʙatta, ki in Qur'on pandest agar sa'odati xudro ʙixohand
pas har ki ʙixohad, onro ʙixonad va az on andarz ʙigirad va az hidojatas foida ʙiʙarad
Va pand nagirand, magar in ki Alloh xohad hidojati onhoro. U ta'olo sojoni on ast, ki az U ʙitarsand va ito'atas kunand. Va U sojoni omurzidan ast kasonero, ki ʙa U imon orandu ito'atas kunand
Alloh ta'olo savgand jod mekunad: Qasam mexuram ʙa ruzi qijomat ruze, ki hisoʙu cazo ast
Va qasam mexuram ʙa nafsi mu'mini parhezgor, ki sohiʙasro ʙar tarki to'atho va murtakiʙ sudani gunohho malomatgar ast
Ojo insoni kofir mepindorad, ki Mo hargiz ustuxonhojasro gird naxohem ovard, ʙa'd az on ki pusid va parokandagardid
Ore, mo tamomi ustuxonhoi pusidai insonro gird meovarem va hatto az in ham farotar qodir hastem, ki sarangusthojasro ʙaroʙar kunem, cunonki pes az marg dar hajoti dunjo ʙudand
Balki, insoni munkir ʙa ruzi ʙa's mexohad, ki dar ojanda niz ʙa korhoi nosoista pardozad
Insoni kofir az rui takaʙʙur va risxand mepursad: «Ruzi qijomat ci vaqt xohad ʙud?»
Ruze, ki casmho az siddati saxtii ruzi qijomat xira savad
va moh tira savad va nuras az ʙajn ravad
va oftoʙu moh ʙo raftani nurason dar jak coj gird ojand
Inson dar on ruz megujad: «Rohi gurez az azoʙ kucost?»
Amr na cunon ast, ki ej inson, tu tamanno mekuni. Hargiz (dar on ruz panohgohe nest)
Qarorgohi hama dar on ruz nazdi Parvardigori tust! Pas har jakero tiʙqi amalhojas cazoi munosiʙ xohad dod
Dar on ruz odamiro az tamomi amalhoi neku ʙade, ki on ci pesopes dar hajoti xud firistoda va on ci ʙa'd az xes guzostaast, xaʙar doda mesavad
Balki inson ʙar nafsi xud ʙino ast va haqiqati kore, ki az to'at jo ma'sijat ancom dodaast, medonad
Harcand uzrhoi xudro dar mijon ovarad, ʙa holas hec foidae namekunad
Ej Pajomʙar hangomi furud omadani vahj ʙasitoʙ zaʙon ʙa xondani Qur'on macunʙon, ʙa xotiri on ki hifzi on az jodi tu naravad
ki haroina, cam' ovardanu xondanas ʙar uhdai Most, ʙa'd az on har kuco ki xohi ʙixon, az xotirat nameravad
cun onro ʙa zaʙoni Caʙrail alajhissalom ʙar tu ʙixondem, ʙa diqqat gus faro deh va az xondani on pajravi kun
sipas ʙajoni ma'noho va hukmhoi on ʙar uhdai Most
Hargiz cunin nest, ki sumo musrikon mepindored, ki duʙora zinda sudan va cazo nest, ʙalki sumo in cahoni zudguzarro dust medored
va oxiratro ʙo ne'mathojas tark mekuned
Dar on ruz ʙaroi mu'minoni sa'odatmand cehrahoe hast zeʙovu duraxson
ki sui Parvardigorason nazar mekunand
Va dar on ruz ʙaroi kofironi ʙadʙaxt cehrahoe hast aʙusu turs, (pesoni dar ham kasida, zistruj)
ki medonad on azoʙi kamarsikan ʙar u furud ojad
Ore, cun con ʙa halqum (ʙa gulu) rasad
va gufta savad, ki ci kasest, ki afsun ʙixonad va uro nacot dihad
Va odami miranda jaqin kunad, ki zamoni cudoi faro rasida
va soqhoi po dar ham pecida savand
on ruz, ruzi rondan va ʙozgastan ʙa sui Parvardigori tust. Va oqiʙati kori ʙandagon ʙa cannat ast jo ʙa duzax
Na tasdiq kardaast in insoni kofir ʙa pajomʙar va Qur'on va ruzi oxirat va na ʙaroi Parvardigoras namoz guzoridaast
Vale Qur'onro duruƣ ʙarovarda va az imon ruj gardonidaast
On goh ʙa raftori xiromon va sarmast nazdi ahli xud raftaast
Voj (halok) ʙar tu, pas voj (halok) ʙar tu
Boz ham voj (halok) ʙar tu, pas voj (halok) ʙar tu
Ojo insoni munkir ʙa ruzi ʙa's mepindorad, ki uro ʙa holi xud voguzostaand? Pas na mavridi amru nahj va na mavridi hisoʙu cazo qaror xohad girift
Ojo u nutfae az mani, ki dar ʙacadone rexta mesud, naʙud
Sipas ʙa'd az nutfa ʙa surati xuni ʙasta daromad. Pas Alloh uro ofarid va durust va ustuvor soxt
Pas az u du cuft: naru moda padid ovard
Ojo cunin Ofaridagor qodir nest, ki murdagonro zinda sozad? Ore ʙar in kor tavonost, zero ʙozgardonidani ofarinis az ecodi naxustini on osontar ast
Ba rosti, ki omadaast ʙar odami muddate az zamon, ki pes az damidani ruh dar vucudas cize qoʙili zikre naʙud
Haroina, Mo odamiro az nutfae omexta ofaridem, to uro ʙo vazifahoi sar'i imtihon kunem. Va sunavoju ʙinojas soxtaem, to ʙisnavad ojathoro va ʙuʙinad dalelhoro
Haroina, rohro ʙa u nison dodem. Xoh mu'mini sukrguzor ʙosad xoh kofiri nosukr
Haroina, Mo ʙaroi kofiron zancirho omoda kardem, to pojhojasonro ʙuʙandand va tavqho muhajjo kardem, to dasthojasonro ʙar gardanhojason ʙuʙandand va otasi afruxta niz omoda kardem
Haroina, nekon ahli to'at va ixlos, onhoe ki haqqi Allohro ado mekunand, ruzi qijomat az saroʙe menusand, ki omexta ʙa kofur ast
In saroʙe, ki omexta ʙo kofur ast az casmaest, ki ʙandagoni Alloh az on menusand va onro ʙar har coe, ki mexohand, ʙa osoni ravon mesozand
In ʙandagoni Alloh cun nazr kunand, vafo mekunand va az azoʙi Alloh dar ruzi qijomat, ki zarar va ʙadii on hama insonhoro faro megirad, metarsand
Va ta'omero dar hole xud dustas dorandu va ʙa on muhtoc hastand, ʙa kamʙaƣalu jatim va asir mexuronand
Ba zaʙoni hol megujand cuz in hadafi digare nest, ki sumoro faqat ʙaroi rizogii Alloh ta'om medihem va az sumo na podose mexohem na sipose
Badurusti, Mo az Parvardigori xud, dar ruze, ki gunahkoron tursruj ʙosand va on ruzi xele saxt ast, metarsem
Pas Alloh onhoro az saxtii on ruz nigah dost va dar rujhojason xusholiju tarovat va dar dilhojason sodmoni ʙaxsid
Baroi saʙre, ki dar dunjo kardaand, mukofoti on ʙihisti anʙarsirist dod, ki dar on liʙoshoi aʙresimi mepusand
Dar on co ʙar taxtho takja zadaand, na garmii oftoʙero meʙinand va na xunukii saxtero
Sojahoi daraxtonas ʙar sarason aftoda va mevahojas ʙa farmonason ʙosad
Va xodimon ta'omhoro dar kosahoi nuqragin va saroʙro dar kuzaho dar mijonason ʙa gardis meorand
Kuzahoe az nuqra, ki onhoro ʙa andozae pur kardaand
Dar on co nekukoronro saroʙe ʙinusonand, ki omexta ʙo zancaʙil ʙosad
az casmae, ki onro Salsaʙil megujand
Va hamesa cavonone ʙa girdason ʙaroi xidmat davr mezanand, ki cun onhoro ʙuʙini, pindori, ki az zeʙoiason gujo marvoridi afsondasudaand
Va cun ongoh ʙa kadom coi cannat ʙingari, har ci ʙingari, ne'mati farovon va mulki vase'i ʙuzurgast, ki intiho nadorad
Bar tani ʙihistijon comahoest darunas az aʙresimi tunuki saʙz va ʙerunas az aʙresimi ƣafs. Va ʙo dastʙandhoe az nuqra orosta sudaand va ʙinusonad onhoro Parvaridigorason saroʙi pokro
Va gufta savad ʙa onho: Haroina, in podosi amalhoi neki sumost va kusishoe, ki dar dunjo karded, az nazdi Alloh siposguzori sudaast
Haroina, Mo Qur'onro ej Pajomʙar ʙar tu ʙo tadric nozil kardem, to ki mardumro ʙa savoʙu va'daho va ʙa azoʙu husdorhoi on pand dihi
Pas dar ʙaroʙari farmoni Parvardigorat soʙir ʙos va az hec musrike, ki dar sahvatho ƣutta zadaast jo kofire, ki dar kufru zalolat furu raftaast, ito'at makun
Va ʙomdodu somgohon nomi Parvardigoratro ʙa zaʙon jod kun
Va dar ʙaxse az saʙ ʙarojas namoz ʙigzor va Uro ʙaxsi daroze az saʙ ʙa poki jod kun
Haroina, inho kofiron va musrikon in dunjoi zudguzarro dust dorand va on ruzi dusvor (qijomat)-ro pusti sar mepartojand. (Ja'ne, ʙaroi oxirat amal namekunand)

Mo ʙa qudrati Xud onhoro (odamijonro) ofaridaem va a'zovu pajvandhojasonro ʙa vasilai ragu pajvand nerumandu mustahkam gardonidem va agar xohem onhoro halok karda, ʙa coi onho qavme monandason ʙijovarem, ki ʙandai mutei Alloh savand
Haroina, in sura pandest ʙaroi olamijon. Pas, har ki ʙaroi xud dar dunjovu oxirat nekui xohad, ʙigirad rohi imon va parhezgoriro, on rohe ki uro ʙa sui ʙaxsis va rozigii Alloh meʙarad
Va sumo cuz on nametavoned ʙixohed, magar in ki Alloh xosta ʙosad. Hamono Alloh donost ʙa ahvoli ʙandagonas va hakim ast dar tadʙiru korguzorihojas
Har kasro, ki az ʙandagonas ʙixohad, somili rahmat va rozigii xud sozad va ʙaroi sitamkoron va tacovuzkunandagoni hududhoi Ilohi azoʙi dardovare omoda kardaast
Alloh savgand jod mekunad: Savgand ʙa ʙodhoe, ki az pai ham meojand
va savgand ʙa ʙodhoi saxti vazandai haloksozanda
va savgand ʙa faristagone, ki ʙa ʙodhoi ʙoronovar uhdadorand, har kuco ki Alloh xohad ʙoronro meʙarand
va savgand ʙa faristagone, ki cudokunandaand haqro az ʙotil va halolro az harom
va savgand ʙa faristagone, ki vahji Ilohiro az nazdi Alloh ʙa sui pajomʙaron mefarorand
to huccatro ʙarpo namojand jo mardumro ʙim namojand
ki haroina, on ci ʙa sumo az amri ruzi qijomat va'da doda savad, voqe' xohad sud
Pas, on goh ki sitoragon nest va xomus savand va ravsanii onho az ʙajn ravad
va on goh ki osmon sikofta savad
va on goh ki kuhho pora-pora gardand va dar fazo ʙarʙod ravand va hec asare az onho ʙoqi namonad
va on goh ki pajomʙaronro vaqte mu'ajjan savad, ki mijoni onho va ummatonason dovari savad
Pas gujand: ʙaroi kadom ruz in cizho mavquf guzosta sud
Ongoh gufta savad: ʙaroi ruzi fasl, ki dar on mijoni mardum muvofiqi a'molason dovari sodir mesavad
Va ci doni, ki ruzi fasl va siddat va saxtii on cist
Dar on ruz voj (haloki ʙod) ʙar duruƣsumorandagon
Ojo ʙa saʙaʙi duruƣʙarovardanason pajomʙaronro ummatoni pesinaro monandi qavmi Nuh, Od va Samud halok nakardaem
Ba'd az on ummatoni oxirinro (az kuffori Makka va amsoli onho, ki hazrati Muhammad sallallohu alajhi va sallamro duruƣ meʙarorand,) niz az pai onho nameʙarem
Bo gunahkoron cunin raftor mekunem. In ravisi mo dar mavridi onhost
Dar on ruz voj (haloki va azoʙi saxt ʙod) ʙar duruƣsumorandagon; kasone, ki ʙa jagonagii Alloh va risolati pajomʙaron va ʙa ruzi zinda sudani ʙa'd az marg va hisoʙ ʙovar nadorand
Ojo ej kofiron, sumoro az oʙe haqiru nociz (nutfa) najofaridaem
Va onro dar cojgohe ustuvor qaror nadodem, ki on ʙacadoni zan ast
to zamone mu'ajjan, ki hamon zamoni homiladori ast
Mo ʙar on kor tavono ʙudaem, pas Mo neku tavono hastem
Dar on ruzi qijomat voj (haloki va azoʙi saxt ʙod) ʙar duruƣsumorandagon, ki qudrati Moro duruƣ meʙarorand
Ojo zaminro cojgohi farogire nasoxtem, ki hamai sumoro faro megirad
ʙaroi zindagivu margaton, ki zindaho dar on zindagi mekunand va murdaho dar on dafn mesavand
Dar on (zamin) kuhhoi ʙaland padid ovardem, to zamin mahkam gardad va takon naxurad va ʙa sumo oʙi sirin va guvoro nusonidem
Dar on ruzi qijomat voj (haloki va azoʙi saxt ʙod) ʙar duruƣsumorandagon ʙa in ne'matho
Ruzi qijomat ʙaroi kofiron gufta mesavad: Biraved ʙa sui azoʙi duzax on ci dar dunjo duruƣas mesumorided
Biraved ʙa sui sojae az dudi cahannam, ki doroi sesoxa ast
ki on na sojai xunuk ast va na dar on ruz harorati otasro ʙozmedorad
Haroina, cahannam sarorahoe meafkanad, ki dar ʙuzurgii xud monandi ʙalandii qasri azim ast
gujo, ki on saroraho usturone sijahtoʙi zardrang ʙosand
Dar on ruzi qijomat voj (haloki va azoʙi saxt ʙod) ʙar duruƣsumorandagon, ki azoʙi Allohro duruƣ meʙarorand
In qijomat ruzest, ki hec kas az duruƣsumorandagon suxan nagujand
Onhoro ruxsat nadihand, to uzr xohand, zero ʙarojason uzre nest
Dar on ruzi qijomat voj (haloki va azoʙi saxt ʙod) ʙar duruƣsumorandagon, ki in ruzro va on ci dar on ast duruƣ meʙarorand
In ruz, ruzi fasl ast, ki dar in ruz ʙajni haq va ʙotil cudo megardad va sumo ej kofironi in ummat va kofironi pesinijonatonro gird meovarem
Pas, agar hilae dored, ki xudro az azoʙ xalos kuned, ʙa kor ʙared
Dar on ruzi qijomat voj (haloki va azoʙi saxt ʙod) ʙar duruƣsumorandagon, ki ruzi qijomatro duruƣ meʙarorand
Haroina, parhezgoron, ki dar dunjo az azoʙi Pravardigorason tarsidand va farmudahojasro ʙa co ovardand va az man'kardhojas dur istodand, dar sojaho va kanori casmasoronand
Va az har mevae, ki orzu kunand, ʙahra meʙarand
Barojason gufta mesavad: Ba podosi korhoe, ki dar dunjo az amalhoi soista mekardaed, ʙo lazzatu guvoro ʙixured va ʙijosomed
Haroina, Mo nekukoronro incunin podos medihem
Dar on ruzi qijomat voj (haloki va azoʙi saxt ʙod) ʙar duruƣsumorandagon, ki ruzi hisoʙu cazoro va on ci dar on ast az ne'matho va azoʙho duruƣ meʙarorand
Sipas Alloh kofironro tahdid karda guftaast: Bixuredu andak ʙahrae ʙargired dar dunjo, ki haroina, sumo gunahkoroned ʙa saʙaʙe, ki ʙa Allohi jakto sarik meovarded
Dar on ruzi qijomat voj (haloki va azoʙi saxt ʙod) ʙar duruƣsumorandagon, ki ruzi hisoʙu cazoro duruƣ meʙarorand
Va cun ʙaroi musrikon gufta savad, ki namoz guzored va ruku' kuned, namoz nameguzorand va ruku' namekunand, ʙalki takaʙʙur mevarzand
Dar on ruzi qijomat voj (haloki va azoʙi saxt ʙod) ʙar duruƣsumorandagon, ki mu'cizahoi Allohro duruƣ meʙarorand
Agar ʙa in Qur'on imon naovardand, pas, az Qur'on ʙa kadom suxan imon meovarand? Hol on ki Qur'on xud mu'ciza va ʙajonkunandai hama cizhost va ahkomu xaʙarhojas ravsan ast
